name: ARS 420 Fall 18: Pathogen
description:
Pathogen is a communication-based game similar to Mafia or Trouble in Terrorist Town. Players start either healthy or infected and don’t know other players’ roles. Healthy players must communicate to determine who is infected and kill them. Infected players must discreetly infect everyone.

Players can load up the game and host or join a private direct connect match over IP and port 7777 or a public match over matchmaking (this nearly doesn't work, though, so avoid it if possible).

Made in Unity for ARS 420: Team Game Design. We're a team of five developers. Our names are:

TJ Couch - Programmer

Breanna Dotson - Artist, focus on props

Eric Poole - Artist, focus on map

Gabe Smith - Artist, focus on character

Austin Vickers - Programmer
